candidates.name: Nicola Patrick
candidates.why_elect: I have diverse and relevant experience working at senior levels in the public, private, charitable and iwi sectors in Australia and NZ, as a volunteer, and I've served three years as a councillor. Educated in Whanganui, I have a science degree from Massey University and am mum to two boys.
candidates.why_stand: I stood for Horizons Regional Council because I love Whanganui and NZ and want to see them thrive. I believe in environmental, economic and social values underpinning good decision-making and want to make a difference as a regional councillor.
